recipes.name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Cook marinated chicken in a pan until tender.
Prepare the butter-based tomato gravy and mix with cooked chicken.
recipes.description: A rich and creamy tomato-based curry with tender chicken pieces.

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka
instructions: Cut paneer and vegetables into cubes.
Marinate paneer and vegetables in spiced yogurt.
Grill or bake until golden brown.
recipes.description: A flavorful grilled dish with marinated paneer and vegetables.

recipes.name: Masala Dosa
instructions: Soak rice and lentils, grind to make batter, and ferment overnight.
Prepare potato masala filling with spices.
Cook dosa on a hot griddle and fill with potato masala.
recipes.description: A crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato mixture.
